VariableDescription.Name: despin
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Despin Method (0:not despun; 1 optical aspect; 2:sun pulse; 3:array voltage; 4 mag field model; 4/5 - solar array method)
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           HAWKEYE Magnetic Field
#     PROJECT                         NSSDC Archive
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     HK>HAWKEYE
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>High resolution level-0 Data
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MAG>Magnetic Field
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     TEXT                            Gurnett, D. A., and L. A. Frank, A region of intense plasma wave turbulences                           
#                                      on auroral field lines, JGR, 82, 1031, 1977                                                           
#                                     Farrell, W. M., and J. A. Van Allen, Observations of the Earth"s  polar cleft                          
#                                      at large radial distances with Hawkeye 1 magnetometer, JGR, 95, 20945, 1990                           
#     MODS                            Created by S. Chen on 2-5-97
#                                     Modified by R. Kessel on 13 June 2000
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0110
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 hk_h0_mag_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  hk_h0_mag
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Hawkeye Magnetic Field Instrument
#     PI_NAME                         J. Van Allen
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  University of Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Hawkeye
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Hawkeye_Mag_Definitive-H0_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time
#  2. Despin Method (0:not despun; 1 optical aspect; 2:sun pulse; 3:array voltage; 4 mag field model; 4/5 - solar array method)
#       NOTES:  0 - not despun; 1 - optical aspect  system; 2 - lepedea method; 3 - magnetometer method; 4/5 -  solar array method - interpolated
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 19:22:17 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  0 - not despun; 1 - optical aspect  system; 2 - lepedea method; 3 - magnetometer method; 4/5 -  solar array method - interpolated
#
TIME                    DESPIN_METHOD
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms               
06-06-1974 04:28:06.890             1

VariableDescription.Name: dphase
